title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view
description: Any item cannot be selected at first attempt in the library outline view. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, such as a label, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to a library file. 2. Open the library outline view. 3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
